source("scripts/acb_dre.R")

reactable(
  df %>% 
    select(-equipo, -abb, -rival, -matches, -logo_cuadrado),
  columns = list(
    license_license_str15 = colDef(
      name = "",
      html = TRUE,
      cell = function(value, index) {
        htmltools::HTML(
          combine_word(
            license_license_str15 = value,
            rival = df$rival[index],
            logo_cuadrado = df$logo_cuadrado[index]
          )
        )
      }
    ),
    time_played   = colDef(name = "Min",  align = "right", vAlign = "center"),
    ts_pct        = colDef(name = "Ts%",  align = "right", vAlign = "center"),
    usg_pct       = colDef(name = "Usg%", align = "right", vAlign = "center"),
    points        = colDef(name = "Pts",  vAlign = "center"),
    asis          = colDef(name = "Ast",  vAlign = "center"),
    total_rebound = colDef(name = "Reb",  vAlign = "center"),
    turnovers     = colDef(name = "Tot",  vAlign = "center"),
    steals        = colDef(name = "Stl",  vAlign = "center"),
    blocks        = colDef(name = "Blk",  vAlign = "center"),
    x2pm_a        = colDef(name = "2pt",  align = "right", vAlign = "center"),
    x3pm_a        = colDef(name = "3pt",  align = "right", vAlign = "center"),
    x1pm_a        = colDef(name = "1pt",  align = "right", vAlign = "center"),
    val           = colDef(name = "Val",  align = "center", vAlign = "center"),
    dre           = colDef(name = "Dre",  align = "center", vAlign = "center"),
    differential  = colDef(name = "+/-",  vAlign = "center")
  ),
  fullWidth = TRUE,      # usa todo el ancho disponible del chunk
  width     = "100%",    # asegura 100% del contenedor
  defaultPageSize = 25,
  theme = reactableTheme(
    header = list(
      borderBottom = "3px solid black",
      textAlign = "center",
      fontSize = "11px"
    ),
    style = list(
      fontFamily = "Oswald",
      fontSize   = "11px"  # aquí haces el “zoom”: baja a 10px, 9px si quieres más info a la vista
    )
  )
)
